title: T206 Johnson Portrait EPDG for trade
author: David R

posts.post_title: T206 Johnson Portrait EPDG for trade
posts.post_content: Looking for this same card with a Hindu back.  I have this EPDG to trade or cash.  In terms of trade, I am looking for another Johnson portrait with a tougher back (first choice is Hindu).  I might be interested in a trade for any of the following with a tougher back: red Cobb, Young portrait or glove, or Matty portrait with a tougher back as well.

[quote name="Jlighter" post=1025179]Pm sent[/QUOTE]

I have not received any PM from you.
